posts.description:
I wasn't having the best day yesterday... All I could think to do was listen to some music and just draw whatever, just so I don't have to think. Draw something not caring how it turns out. Not caring about the lines, or the colors, or anything. The best things come when you just let go of whatever's holding you back, I guess... And I blame all these realizations on @annaslettering, and anyone who follows her can probably relate. 😄 
Anyways, this was one of the doodles I drew and I thought I'd make a weekly out of it. 🌸

How many pens does a girl need? All of them! 🙋‍♀️😂 | Review of the Mildliners is up on my blog (link in bio). I know you've been seeing these everywhere, but for those who still can't make up their mind whether to get them, the post is for you 😉 aaand maybe the Crayola Supertips are insanely cheap dupes 😉 check it to find out!

Oh, and check out my Stories for the "aftermath" of this setup. 😂

Last week 🌸🌹 | On a totally unrelated subject, if you guys had to watch only one movie/series for the rest of your life, which would it be? I feel like I haven't watched a Really good movie in a looong time, so help a girl out! 🤣
...
The font is called 'Better Together'

Bye, March. | You guys, I JUST UPLOADED my very 1st YouTube video, after a very long time of being too shy to do it! But it's here, and thank you guys so much for all the encouragement! ❤️ Click the link in my bio and come Plan with Me! 😄 And if you've already set up for April, you should still go check it out cuz you might find some inspo for other spreads 😆
And by the way, this is not my proudest tracker... But I'm keeping it real here 😂
...
Font: 'Better Together'

A very overdue and useful page for social media junkies like myself. 🙆

The 'Blog' section is specific to the theme that I use, so they're not necessarily standard dimensions. 😊

Supplies:
▪️Notebook: @janesagenda
▪️Zebra Mildliner in Smoke Blue ▪️@staedtlermars fineliner in 0.3
▪️@crayola Supertips

You guys! I made this stationery storage unit myself and the best part is that it cost me less than $10! Click the link in my bio for the blog post with all the info you need to make this yourself! I just love how it adds such a nice pop of color(s) to my little planning area, AND I finally have somewhere to display my washi!
💛💚💙💜

Minimalism isn't the opposite of creativity - Rant incoming❗I've finally found the time to setup my bujo, and to be honest, I've been stuck in a rut lately. I haven't touched it for the past few weeks. Mostly because I've been moving, but also because I'm in an inspiration-burnout.

I feel like I've tried almost everything when it comes to bujos (notebooks, layouts, doodles, minimalism-ish, etc) and I still haven't found something that I'm at least 90% happy with. Part of it is because my schedule is always so dynamic that I need to experiment every single month. Another part is because I feel like I haven't found my "style", and when I look at all these gorgeous bujos on Insta I feel like everyone has theirs. Like I don't even have to check the username and I know whom the spread belongs to. Whereas me, I feel all over the place. And you'd think after a year I would've reached that point.

And don't get me wrong - the journey has been really fun. But I'm really feeling a need to "settle". I need something to call my own and stick with it for a while. I need a system that works even when I'm lacking inspiration.

This story has a happy ending though, because I do feel like I'm finally getting very close to what I need, now that I've realized it. Which is functionality over aesthetics. Maybe minimalism. Whatever works. And minimalism isn't the opposite of creativity! And if you relate to what I've written here, then let that sink in for a while. It might help.

On another note, I don't say this enough, but thank you all so much for your support, always. I've made some virtual friends through this account and connected with people from all over the world, something which I wouldn't have been able to do otherwise. Much love to you all!

Also wanted to give a very loving shout-out to my new bujo crush @amandarachdoodles whose amazing spreads have played a very big part in my realizations. 😄❤️ #bulletjournal #bujo #bujojunkies #bulletjournaling #bulletjournaljunkies #bujocommunity #bulletjournalcommunity #bulletjournallove #bujolove #bulletjournalsystem #bohoberrytribe #notebook #planner #planneraddict #plannercommunity #planning #organisation #planwithme #studyblr

The package from @bricksxcastle finally arrived and I'm having a washi-gasm! 😅
Now all I wanna do is pen-tests and washi collection spreads!

They have free international shipping + 10% off with the code "MYLIFE10". I'm apologizing to your wallets in advance! 😉
I'm finished planning for next week but I'm so not ready for it. Anyone who has experienced moving probably understands why 😟 but I'm so excited to set up my work space at the new place! 🙆

What a pretty sight, right?! 😍 I reviewed this @mosseryco planner in my latest blog post (link in bio)! I went over its features, flip-through, customization options, pen tests, and I also talked about whether it can be used as a BuJo! So go check it out and don't forget to use the code "MYLIFE15" for 15% off the planners (valid until 17th March)! ❤️
